Posts.Content: IrishDancingMom wrote: Hello all... I was just diagnoised with Stage 0 beginning of this month. I decided to have a lumpectomy with radiation (surgery this Friday). I'm very scared about the surgery (never had to be put under) and also the wire localization before the surgery. I've heard everything from "barely felt it" to "worst pain ever". Can I hear some reassuring stories about the surgery and wire localization please? I'm really scared. Also my mom had surgery and she had woken up during the surgery and I don't want that to happen to me. Thanks so much. Kirsty Love is all you need..Beatles Dx 8/9/2013, DCIS, 3cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/0 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Surgery 8/23/2013 Lumpectomy: Left Radiation Therapy 9/30/2013 Breast Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy Told different stories about wire localization IrishDancingMom dogsandjogs
